title: How to Buy a Weapon in Red Dead Redemption

steps.headline: Pause the game and choose "Map" from the menu.
Scroll around the map to find a town.
Zoom in to a town and look for a gun shop.
steps.description: When you zoom in, store icons appear, telling you what kinds of services are available. Gunsmiths are represented by a "pistol" icon.

steps.headline: Travel to a town with a gunsmith.
Walk into the gunsmith and speak to the shopkeeper.
steps.description: This brings up an item list with "Buy" and "Sell" at the top. Select "Buy."

steps.headline: Purchase a weapon from the item list.
steps.description: Thrown weapons such as dynamite, fire bottles, and throwing knives can be purchased at any gunsmith after you first acquire each item by completing certain sections of the game.

text: Finding Gunsmiths on the Map Pause the game and choose "Map" from the menu.  Scroll around the map to find a town.  Zoom in to a town and look for a gun shop. When you zoom in, store icons appear, telling you what kinds of services are available. Gunsmiths are represented by a "pistol" icon. Buying Weapons at a Gunsmith Travel to a town with a gunsmith.  Walk into the gunsmith and speak to the shopkeeper. This brings up an item list with "Buy" and "Sell" at the top. Select "Buy." Purchase a weapon from the item list. Thrown weapons such as dynamite, fire bottles, and throwing knives can be purchased at any gunsmith after you first acquire each item by completing certain sections of the game.
